text: José 'Pepe' Pinto Rosas (born 11 November 1929) is a Spanish retired footballer who played as a defender, and a current coach. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:People from Antequera Category:Spanish footballers Category:Andalusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División players Category:Tercera División players Category:Girona FC players Category:CD Condal players Category:FC Barcelona players Category:Real Valladolid players Category:Spanish football managers Category:Segunda División B managers Category:Tercera División managers Category:CE Manresa managers Category:Girona FC managers Category:UE Olot managers Category:UE Figueres managers Category:UE Llagostera managers
title: Pepe Pinto
